positions.subtitle: Karbon Card
positions.description: - Led a team focused on driving scalable growth through optimized processes and efficient systems.- Implemented automated processes to streamline the customer acquisition funnel, resulting in improved efficiency and increased conversions.- Developed and executed strategic plans to achieve growth targets and maximize ROI.- Provided team leadership, inspiration, and guidance to foster professional growth and ensure high-performance levels.- Monitored and evaluated KPIs, metrics, and performance indicators to measure the effectiveness of growth initiatives.
positions.title: Growth Manager - Operations
positions.description_html:
- Led a team focused on driving scalable growth through optimized processes and efficient systems.
- Implemented automated processes to streamline the customer acquisition funnel, resulting in improved efficiency and increased conversions.
- Developed and executed strategic plans to achieve growth targets and maximize ROI.
- Provided team leadership, inspiration, and guidance to foster professional growth and ensure high-performance levels.
- Monitored and evaluated KPIs, metrics, and performance indicators to measure the effectiveness of growth initiatives.
